ygData.subject: Re: No More Sash Cheats...
ygData.msgSnippet: The religious affiliation is the heart of this problem. Ashen Order monks (like me) worship Quellious. Silent Fist monks are agnostic. The Ashen Order
ygData.messageBody:
The religious affiliation is the heart of this
problem. Ashen Order monks (like me) worship
Quellious. Silent Fist monks are agnostic. The Ashen
Order guildmasters don't care much for agnostics but
the Silent Fist monks like Ashen Order monks merely
because they are monks, they do not care who you
worship. Hence the problem. I hail from Freeport and
when I traveled west I was able to do the headband
quests before I had killed a single gnoll. Many have
said that killing orcs will raise faction with the
Ashen Order; I do not know if that is true but they
liked me to begin with. I am always willing to help
our Qeynos brothers in any way that I can so I will
turn in sash items for sashes if anyone asks.
I would say that becoming a better monk (i.e. getting
higher level headbands SHOULD raise faction with the
Ashen Order if it does not) I can only encourage more
research and for us all to be aware of what things
raise faction with which guild.
Good journeys and may Truth guide you,
Brother Kingdok
